data: It was about half-past three in the afternoon when Bertha, the housemaid, came running down the steps, with a shrill cry of “Fire!” and fell plump into the arms of the bake-shop girl, who had seen the smoke curling from Prof. Arnold’s window and was hastening across to warn the occupants of his house.

It was about half-past three in the afternoon when Bertha, the housemaid, came running down the steps, with a shrill cry of "Fire!" and fell plump into the arms of the bake-shop girl, who had seen the smoke curling from Prof. Arnold's window and was hastening across to warn the occupants of his house.
The Incendiary: A Story of Mystery
